nomeDoTeste: Realizar login com credenciais inválidas (username e password)

login.query: mutation Mutation($username: String!, $password: String!) { login(username: $username, password: $password) { token } }
mutation Mutation($username: String!, $password: String!) { login(username: $username, password: $password) { token } }
mutation Mutation($username: String!, $password: String!) { login(username: $username, password: $password) { token } }
